name: server
description: Chitter app backend built with Express and Prisma.

scripts.reset:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development dotenv -e ../.env.development -r dotenv-expand/config -- npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.migrate:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development dotenv -e ../.env.development -r dotenv-expand/config -- npx prisma migrate dev --name inititalise
scripts.start:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development dotenv -e ../.env.development -r dotenv-expand/config -- nodemon src/server.ts
scripts.build:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production tsc --project tsconfig.prod.json && npx prisma generate
scripts.migrate:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production dotenv -e ../.env.production -r dotenv-expand/config -- npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.start:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production dotenv -e ../.env.production -r dotenv-expand/config -- node dist/src/server.js
scripts.reset:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test dotenv -e ../.env.test -r dotenv-expand/config -- npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.migrate:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test dotenv -e ../.env.test -r dotenv-expand/config -- npx prisma migrate dev --name inititalise
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test dotenv -e ../.env.test -r dotenv-expand/config -- vitest run
scripts.test:unit: cross-env NODE_ENV=test TEST_TYPE=unit dotenv -e ../.env.test -r dotenv-expand/config -- vitest run
scripts.test:unit:watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=test TEST_TYPE=unit dotenv -e ../.env.test -r dotenv-expand/config -- vitest --watch
scripts.test:integration: cross-env NODE_ENV=test TEST_TYPE=integration dotenv -e ../.env.test -r dotenv-expand/config -- vitest run
scripts.test:integration:watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=test TEST_TYPE=integration dotenv -e ../.env.test -r dotenv-expand/config -- vitest --watch
